name: File Backup
description: Backs up user profile data (Documents, Desktop, Pictures, Signatures, etc.) to network share with progress dialog and email notification.
author: Justin Garcia

parameters.name: WhatIf
parameters.description: Dry run - shows what would be copied

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description: Shows detailed debug logging in console output

parameters.name: PromptForDeletion
parameters.description: Prompt to delete backup after completion
